mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AB_DOC ( ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, IMG_DEC, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_STS, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SEQ}, #{IP, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{WID}, #{HGT}, #{IMG_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_SRC_SIZ}, #{IMG_RSLT, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_RSLT_SIZ}, #{SHAPES, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IMG_DEC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_WID}, #{THUMB_HGT}, #{THUMB_SRC, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{THUMB_SRC_SIZ}, 'R', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SEQ, IP, IMG_DEC, IMG_WID, IMG_HGT, IMG_SRC_SIZ, IMG_RSLT_SIZ, SHAPES, THUMB_WID, THUMB_HGT, THUMB_SRC_SIZ, REG_DT FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} AND REG_STS='C' ORDER BY SEQ
SELECT IMG_SRC_SIZ LENGTH, IMG_SRC BYTES FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} AND SEQ=#{SEQ} AND REG_STS='C'
SELECT IMG_RSLT_SRC LENGTH, IMG_RSLT BYTES FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} AND SEQ=#{SEQ} AND REG_STS='C'
SELECT THUMB_SRC_SIZ LENGTH, THUMB_SRC BYTES FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID} AND SEQ=#{SEQ} AND REG_STS='C'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_STS='R'
DELETE FROM AB_DOC WHERE ID=#{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_STS='C'
mapper.update: UPDATE AB_DOC SET REG_STS='C' WHERE ID=#{ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_STS='R'
